definition: trusted/intimate/(of the emperor) to visit/variant of 幸[xing4]
to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive

sentences.english: I worked with Viktor Frankl, a Nazi prison camp survivor, for many years.
sentences.chinese: 長期以來，我曾幫助過一位納粹集中營倖存者。

sentences.english: This construction has survived the Crimean War and the WWII.
sentences.chinese: 這幢建築在克里米亞戰爭和二戰中得以倖存。

sentences.english: They might be,for example,in an accident, and come close to being killed,but walk away without a scratch.
sentences.chinese: 比如說在事故中倖存，差點送命，但結果毫髮無傷。

sentences.english: It is not clear how many survived the collapse of the three-storey building.
sentences.chinese: 倒塌的三層樓下還有多少倖存者目前還不得而知。

sentences.english: But what about other dinosaur relatives that are alive today?
sentences.chinese: 那麼今日仍倖存的恐龍親戚們是什麼情況呢？

sentences.english: The only asset that survived was its URL.
sentences.chinese: 現在唯一倖存下來的資產就是其網址。

sentences.english: Workers built shelters for survivors whose homes had been destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 救援人員爲那些家園被毀的倖存者蓋起了避難所。

sentences.english: The survivors wandered about the jungle for days before being picked up by a search party.
sentences.chinese: 倖存者在叢林中游蕩了好幾天，才被搜索隊救出來。

sentences.english: 'How fantastic to be up above ground again, ' said a 27-r-old survivor who was brought up.
sentences.chinese: 一名被救出的27歲倖存者說，能再回到地上太好了。

sentences.english: And we also had the privilege of meeting with some of their families, as well as some of the courageous survivors.
sentences.chinese: 我們還有幸會見了部分罹難者家屬和無畏的倖存者。

sentences.english: A man named Ma Yuanjiang was the first survivor saved on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 一位叫馬遠江的男人是週二救出的第一位倖存者。

sentences.english: All told, only 137 of the 989 people on board survived the disaster.
sentences.chinese: 全部加起來，船上的989中只有137人倖存。

sentences.english: Then those Communards who had so far escaped were herded together and given mock trials.
sentences.chinese: 倖存下來的公社社員們被集體模擬審判。

sentences.english: Rescue crews gave up any hope today of finding alive the remaining2climbers missing on mount hood.
sentences.chinese: 救援人員今天放棄了胡德山兩名失蹤者倖存的希望。

sentences.english: Of the survivors, 113 were hospitalised, including 21 in critical condition.
sentences.chinese: 倖存者中，113人被送往醫院，21人傷勢嚴重。

sentences.english: Can I survive the sea of troubles of life.
sentences.chinese: 只有駕着奮鬥之舟，我才能在生活的苦海中倖存。

definition: to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
to die in an accident or disaster/to be killed
to level/to raze to the ground
to shoot with a gun/shooting incident
